attributes.action: UK born citizens right to buy property in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Help the people of the UK to help themselves, enabling them to buy property in their own country.
The citizens who were born here in the UK and have lived here all their lives. (Includes those born to UK parents in civil servant jobs - born in another country due to work)

Have a right to buy property in the UK.

No one of any other nation/country other than residing in the UK, can going forward own property whether residential or other.

Creating income and helping with the current housing crisis currently being experienced.
